topic.title: free unique sms number
topic.body:
Hi there,
i would like to know if there is any service i can use to get a free virtual phone number so i can recieve sms. i know there are some free services with avaliable numbers online but i would like to have unique phone numbers. i've tryed the 2nd line app for android, i've created acount and it generated a number i've used. The 2nd line only allows for you to change number in 15 days and i want one that i can change anytime i want!

thnak you!
